name: Anneltha
relicBonuses: After the bearer {ACTION_attacks}, this relic {ACTION_attacks} the enemy as well.
The bearer deals 5% more damage with attacks for each time it has {ACTION_attacked} in the current battle.
This relic and its bearer gain 10% more stats from all sources for each time this relic has {ACTION_attacked} in the current battle.
This relic and its bearer have 3% more {STAT_attack} for each time it and this relic have {ACTION_attacked} in the current battle.
The bearer deals 5% more damage with attacks for each time this relic has {ACTION_attacked} in the current battle.
If the bearer has {ACTION_attacked} at least 5 times in the current battle, it and this relic always deal critical damage with attacks.
If the bearer has {ACTION_attacked} at least 5 times in the current battle, its Spell Gems do not consume any {STAT_charges}.
The bearer takes 3% less damage for each time it and this relic have {ACTION_attacked} in the current battle.
If the bearer has {ACTION_attacked} at least 10 times in the current battle, the potency of its spells is based on its {STAT_attack} rather than its {STAT_intelligence}.
At the start of the bearer's turn, this relic {ACTION_casts} [icons,1976]Fury Swipes on the bearer.
title: Goddess of Earth
